attributes.action: contact the US State Department in regarde to the Visa Waiver Program
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the UK has a Justice system that states you are innocent until proven guilty. 
That US citizen can enter the UK without a Visa if they have been arrested and not charged or convicted. This is a one way agreement in that British Citizens are barred from entering the US if they have every been arrested. These include people who have been arrested and not charged and those that were wrongfully arrested. 
I ask that representations should be made to the US government regarding this point and that the UK apply the same rules to US citizens entering the UK.
